overview: Guess Who's Privates Just Went Public? Carrie is a frustated internet sex fantasies of her fans in gratuitous detail, while inside she is a seething cauldron of unfulfilled lust. When a stranger begins to get beneath her skin through his letters, she finds herself uncontrollably drawn to him, only to discover that her mystery lover is really her best friend and boss. From lust to frenzy Carrie throws off all restraint in a wild sexual game of cat and mouse where there are no rules, no secrets and no way out...
title: Kiss & Tell
